title: TV's original Jimmy Olson has died
content:
The actor who achieved fame as Jimmy Olson on The Adventures of Superman has passed away. 
 
Various sources are reporting that actor Jack Larson has died at his Brentwood, Calif home at the age of 87. The cause of death has not yet been released. 
 
Larson battled typecasting following his portrayal of Jimmy Olson and turned his talents to writing. 
 
However, Larson remained closely associated with the Man of Steel and appeared on shows such as 1990's Superboy and Lois & Clark: The New Adventures of Superman.  
 
Larson also had a cameo in 2006's Superman Returns.  
 
  Greg Belfrage is a lifelong Trekkie, Batmaniac, Godzilla fan, moviephile, television junkie and hopeless geek. He    can be reached at     greg.belfrage@mwcradio.com
